item.title: 巴西 Azul 公司称已完成债务重组程序
item.description: 据一份证券文件显示，巴西 Azul 航空公司周二表示，该公司已与债券持有人、飞机制造商和飞机租赁公司敲定了有关财务义务的债务重组程序。【原文：Brazilian airline Azul said on Tuesday it has finalized a debt restructuring process regarding financial obligations with bondholders, aircraft makers and firms that lease planes, according to a securities filing.】

item.title: Zimmer Biomet 将以 11 亿美元收购 Paragon 28
item.description: Zimmer Biomet 周二表示，将以约 11 亿美元的价格收购医疗器械公司 Paragon 28，以扩大其骨科手术器械产品组合。【原文：Zimmer Biomet said on Tuesday it would acquire medical device company Paragon 28 for about $1.1 billion to expand its portfolio of orthopedic surgical devices.】

item.title: 承保业务和投资收益强劲，保险公司丘博利润上升
item.description: 本周二，保险公司丘博公布第四季度利润增长，主要得益于承保业务的强劲增长和投资回报率的提高。【原文：Insurance company Chubb posted a rise in fourth-quarter profit on Tuesday, helped by strong gains in its underwriting business and higher returns on its investments.】

item.title: 高乐氏任命内部财务总监，公司老将雅各布森将退休
item.description: 清洁产品制造商高乐氏（Clorox）周三表示，长期担任财务主管的凯文-雅各布森（Kevin Jacobsen）将离职，由内部人士吕克-贝莱特（Luc Bellet）接任。【原文：Cleaning products maker Clorox said on Wednesday long-time finance chief Kevin Jacobsen will step down and would be succeeded by insider Luc Bellet.】

item.title: 科尔百货公司裁员 10
item.description: 科尔百货公司（Kohl's）周二表示，该公司已经裁减了近 10%的员工，目的是提高盈利能力。【原文：Kohl's said on Tuesday it has reduced nearly 10% of its corporate workforce, as the department store chain aims to improve profitability.】

item.title: LVMH集团首席执行官阿尔诺表示 "法国疲劳症"，考虑扩大在美国的业务范围
item.description: 奢侈品巨头路威酩轩集团（LVMH）首席执行官贝尔纳-阿尔诺（Bernard Arnault）周二表示，该集团正在 "认真考虑 "提高在美国的生产能力，并称赞美国刮起的 "乐观之风 "与法国可能提高企业税带来的 "阵阵寒流 "形成了鲜明对比。【原文：Luxury giant LVMH is "seriously considering" bulking up its production capacities in the United States, CEO Bernard Arnault said on Tuesday, praising a "wind of optimism" in the country that contrasted with the "cold shower" of potentially higher corporate taxes in France.】

item.title: 澳大利亚怀特黑文煤炭公司第二季度产量增长 92.7
item.description: 澳大利亚怀特黑文煤炭公司（Whitehaven Coal）周三公布，由于新南威尔士州煤矿和最近收购的昆士兰州煤矿的强劲贡献，该公司第二季度产量增长了92.7%。【原文：Australia's Whitehaven Coal posted a 92.7% rise in its second-quarter production on Wednesday, helped by strong contributions from New South Wales mines and its recently acquired Queensland mines.】

item.title: 星空娱乐在资金紧张的情况下剥离悉尼星空活动中心资产
item.description: 澳大利亚明星娱乐公司（Star Entertainment）周三表示，将以 6,000 万澳元（合 3,751 万美元）的价格将其明星悉尼活动中心资产剥离给剧院所有者和运营商 Foundation Theatres。【原文：Australia's Star Entertainment said on Wednesday it would divest its Star Sydney Event Centre assets to theatre owner and operator Foundation Theatres for A$60 million ($37.51 million).】

item.title: 亚洲人工智能恐慌消退，巨型股收益可期
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: LVMH 宣称 2025 年开局良好，但第四季度业绩令人失望
item.description: 奢侈品集团路威酩轩集团（LVMH）首席执行官贝尔纳-阿尔诺（Bernard Arnault）周二表示，该集团在 2025 年取得了良好的开端，此前该集团公布的第四季度销售额略有增长，但分析师警告称，在近期股价上涨之后，该集团的业绩可能仍无法达到市场的预期。【原文：LVMH has made a good start to 2025, CEO Bernard Arnault said on Tuesday, after the luxury conglomerate posted a slight rise in fourth-quarter sales, though analysts cautioned it may still fall short of heightened market expectations after recent share gains.】

item.title: 电动汽车制造商 Lucid 任命 Taoufiq Boussaid 为首席财务官
item.description: Lucid 集团周二表示，该电动汽车制造商已任命资深财务专家 Taoufiq Boussaid 担任首席财务官，此前一年多，Sherry House 已卸任首席财务官一职。【原文：Lucid Group has named veteran finance professional Taoufiq Boussaid as its chief financial officer, the electric vehicle maker said on Tuesday, more than a year after Sherry House stepped down from the role.】

item.title: 电脑配件制造商罗技上调 2025 年业绩预期
item.description: 受企业和游戏玩家对电脑硬件产品强劲需求的支撑，罗技国际公司周二公布了节前重要季度的销售额和利润增长报告，并上调了全年业绩展望。【原文：Logitech International raised its full-year outlook on Tuesday after reporting higher sales and profit for its important pre-holiday quarter, supported by strong demand for computer hardware products for businesses and gamers.】

item.title: 巴西淡水河谷第四季度铁矿石产量下滑 4.6
item.description: 巴西矿商淡水河谷公司周二发布报告称，该公司去年第四季度的铁矿石产量比上年同期下降了4.6%，为8530万吨。【原文：Iron ore production from Brazilian miner Vale fell 4.6% during last year's fourth-quarter compared to the same period a year earlier, settling at 85.3 million metric tons, the company reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 星巴克可比销售额降幅小于预期，扭亏为盈初见成效
item.description: 星巴克周二公布的第一季度可比销售额降幅小于预期，表明首席执行官布赖恩-尼科尔（Brian Niccol）为应对需求低迷的咖啡连锁店所做的扭亏努力初见成效。【原文：Starbucks reported a smaller-than-expected fall in first-quarter comparable sales on Tuesday, indicating early signs of success for CEO Brian Niccol's turnaround efforts for the coffee chain battling sluggish demand.】

item.title: Point72 首席执行官科恩表示，DeepSeek 之后，人工智能前景更加乐观
item.description: Point72 资产管理公司（Point72 Asset Management）创始人史蒂文-科恩（Steven Cohen）周二表示，中国人工智能初创公司 DeepSeek 最近宣布的发展对人工智能的前景是积极的。【原文：Point72 Asset Management's founder Steven Cohen said on Tuesday that the recent developments announced by Chinese artificial intelligence startup DeepSeek are positive for the outlook of artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 美国法院阻止拜登政府制定航空公司费用披露规则
item.description: 美国一家上诉法院周二阻止了拜登政府 2024 年关于预先披露航空公司费用的规定，称交通部没有遵守程序规则。【原文：A U.S. appeals court on Tuesday blocked the Biden administration's 2024 rule on upfront disclosure of airline fees, saying the Transportation Department had not complied with procedural rules.】

item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普的所有关税威胁
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普一上任就发起了无数次关税威胁。这些威胁既包括广泛的威胁--对外国进口商品普遍征收关税，也包括针对特定行业、地区或特定国家的威胁，目的是让其他国家满足他的政策要求。【原文：Upon returning to office, U.S. President Donald Trump has launched numerous tariff threats. They range from broad ones - a universal tariff on foreign-imported goods - to ones aimed at specific sectors, regions, or at specific countries in an effort to get others to meet his policy demands.】

item.title: 英伟达期权因股价反弹吸引逢低买入者
item.description: 周一，人工智能领头羊英伟达（Nvidia）股价大幅下挫，但这丝毫没有影响期权交易员对这家芯片制造商股票的热情，随着周二英伟达股价回升，交易员们又迅速买入看涨英伟达的合约。【原文：Monday's massive selloff in AI-darling Nvidia's shares did little to blunt options traders' enthusiasm for the chipmaker's shares, with traders quick to pile back into bullish Nvidia contracts as the stock recovered on Tuesday.】

item.title: 空中客车公司为 2024 年的新太空冲锋打开大门
item.description: 本周二，空中客车公司（Airbus）表示，将在 2 月 20 日的年度业绩报告中向投资者介绍正在对一项主要卫星计划进行的审查的最新情况，这表明其陷入困境的太空部门可能会面临新的指控。【原文：Airbus signalled a potential new charge in its troubled space division on Tuesday, saying it would update investors on the ongoing review of a major satellite programme during annual results on Feb. 20.】

item.title: 官员称白宫正在评估中国人工智能应用 DeepSeek 对国家安全的影响
item.description: 白宫新闻秘书卡罗琳-利维特（Karoline Leavitt）周二表示，美国官员正在研究中国人工智能应用 DeepSeek 对国家安全的影响。【原文：U.S. officials are looking at the national security implications of the Chinese artificial intelligence app DeepSeek, White House press secretary Karoline Leavitt said on Tuesday.】

item.title: US Bancorp 总裁 Gunjan Kedia 将成为首位女性首席执行官
item.description: U.S. Bancorp 周二宣布，总裁 Gunjan Kedia 将从 4 月 15 日起担任公司首席执行官，成为该银行历史上第一位担任这一职务的女性。【原文：U.S. Bancorp announced on Tuesday that President Gunjan Kedia will become its chief executive, effective April 15, becoming the first woman in the bank's history to take up the role.】

item.title: 随着产量增加，Venture Global 获准在另一家液化天然气工厂引入天然气
item.description: 联邦监管机构周二批准 Venture Global LNG 向其位于路易斯安那州的 Plaquemines 工厂第七区块引入天然气，该公司将继续提高超冷天然气的产量。【原文：Federal regulators on Tuesday gave Venture Global LNG permission to introduce natural gas into the seventh block of its Plaquemines plant in Louisiana as the company continues to ramp up production of the superchilled gas.】

item.title: 史密斯菲尔德食品公司首席执行官表示将继续开放美国猪肉工厂，并在上市之际关注关税问题
item.description: 史密斯菲尔德食品公司（Smithfield Foods）首席执行官谢恩-史密斯（Shane Smith）周二表示，该公司不打算关闭更多的美国猪肉加工厂，该公司在被香港 WH 集团分拆十多年后重返美国交易所。【原文：Smithfield Foods does not plan to close more U.S. pork processing plants, Chief Executive Shane Smith said on Tuesday, as the company returned to a U.S. exchange after more than a decade in a spinoff by Hong Kong-based WH Group .】

item.title: LVMH 第四季度销售额增长 1%，超出预期
item.description: 周二，奢侈品行业的风向标路威酩轩集团（LVMH）第四季度销售额增长1%，超出预期，原因是节日期间对设计师时装和手袋的需求回升。【原文：Luxury bellwether LVMH beat expectations on Tuesday with a 1% rise in fourth-quarter sales as demand for designer fashion and handbags picked up over the holiday season, adding to hopes the sector has turned a corner.】

item.title: 史密斯菲尔德食品公司首次上市不温不火，估值 80 亿美元
item.description: 史密斯菲尔德食品公司（Smithfield Foods）周二股价上涨 1.5%，估值达 81 亿美元。【原文：Smithfield Foods was valued at $8.1 billion after its shares ticked up 1.5% on Tuesday, in a muted debut that might prompt other IPO candidates to tread cautiously.】

item.title: 宝马首席执行官提议将欧盟对美国进口汽车的关税降至 2.5%
item.description: 德国汽车制造商宝马公司首席执行官奥利弗-齐普斯（Oliver Zipse）周二表示，宝马将于本周提议欧盟将美国进口汽车的关税从10%降至2.5%，与美国现行的进口关税保持一致。【原文：BMW will propose this week that the European Union lower its tariff on U.S. car imports to 2.5% from 10%, in line with the current U.S. import tariff, the German automaker's CEO Oliver Zipse said on Tuesday.】

item.title: DeepSeek 恐慌之后，英伟达空头押注获利逾 60 亿美元
item.description: 在中国 DeepSeek 首次推出的低成本人工智能模型震惊华尔街之后，人工智能相关股票的卖空者获得了丰厚的利润，对英伟达的押注产生了创纪录的利润，总额超过 60 亿美元。【原文：Short sellers of artificial intelligence-related stocks raked in bumper profits after the smashing debut of low-cost AI models from China's DeepSeek spooked Wall Street, with bets against Nvidia yielding record profits totaling more than $6 billion.】

item.title: 消息人士称，Northvolt 要求股东在未来两年出资 13 亿美元
item.description: 两位熟悉此事的消息人士告诉路透社，Northvolt 在本月的一次会议上要求 100 多名股东在未来两年内提供 12.9 亿美元，以帮助这家破产的瑞典电池制造商恢复业务。【原文：Northvolt asked more than 100 shareholders at a meeting this month to provide $1.29 billion over the next two years to help restore the bankrupt Swedish battery maker's business, two sources familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: LVMH 第四季度销售额增长 1%，超出预期
item.description: 周二，奢侈品行业的风向标路威酩轩集团（LVMH）第四季度销售额增长1%，超出预期，原因是节日期间对设计师时装和手袋的需求回升。【原文：Luxury bellwether LVMH beat expectations on Tuesday with a 1% rise in fourth-quarter sales as demand for designer fashion and handbags picked up over the holiday season, adding to hopes the sector has turned a corner.】

item.title: 特朗普的数字美元禁令让中国和欧洲的 CBDC 脱缰而去
item.description: 观察家们认为，唐纳德-特朗普迅速禁止 "数字美元 "的举动为中国和欧洲提供了广阔的空间，使其已经取得进展的中央银行数字货币（CBDC）原型成为全球标准制定者。【原文：Donald Trump's rapid move to ban a "digital dollar" has left the field wide open, observers say, for China and Europe to make their already-advanced central bank digital currency (CBDC) prototypes into global standard-setters.】
